entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sparwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm except 4 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 5 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
